seo.whatIsTitle: What is AI-powered text improvement and how does it work?
seo.whatIsContent: **AI-powered text improvement** uses **artificial intelligence** and **natural language processing** to enhance written content by **correcting grammar**, **improving style**, **adjusting tone**, and **optimizing clarity**. This technology analyzes **language patterns**, **writing conventions**, and **contextual meaning** to provide **intelligent suggestions** that make text more **effective, professional, and engaging**. AI text improvement tools can help with **grammar correction**, **style enhancement**, **tone adjustment** (formal/casual), **conciseness optimization**, and **content expansion**. These capabilities are essential for **professional writing**, **academic work**, **business communication**, and **creative content development**. Learn more about [natural language processing](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Natural_language_processing) and [automated writing assistance](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Automated_writing_assistance).
seo.howToTitle: How to use the AI Text Improver tool?
howToSteps: **Enter your text** in the input area (supports various content types)
**Choose improvement type**: Grammar, Style, Formal, Casual, Concise, or Expand
**Select target language** for multilingual improvement (Spanish, English, Portuguese, French)
Click **'Improve text'** and **copy the enhanced result**
seo.useCasesTitle: Common use cases for AI text improvement
useCases: **Professional writing** - enhance business emails, reports, and presentations
**Academic work** - improve research papers, essays, and scholarly articles
**Content marketing** - optimize blog posts, articles, and marketing copy
**Multilingual communication** - improve text in Spanish, English, Portuguese, or French
**Creative writing** - refine stories, scripts, and narrative content

faq.question: How accurate are AI text improvements?
faq.answer: AI text improvement is generally **very accurate** for **grammar, spelling, and style suggestions**. However, it may occasionally make **contextual errors** or suggest changes that **alter your intended meaning**. Always **review suggestions** and maintain your **unique voice and style**.

faq.question: Can AI help with multiple languages?
faq.answer: Yes! AI text improvement supports **multiple languages** including Spanish, English, Portuguese, and French. Each language has its own **grammatical rules, style conventions, and cultural nuances** that the AI takes into account for **culturally appropriate improvements**.

faq.question: Is my text private when using AI improvement?
faq.answer: Yes! Your text is processed **completely privately** through your own **Google Gemini API key**. Nothing is stored on our servers or shared with third parties. All **text processing happens securely** between your browser and Google's AI service, ensuring **complete confidentiality**.
